plot: Made in the style of "Australian Story" (ABC-TV), it imagines the original Easter story in a modern-day context and presents interviews with Pontius Pilate, John Caiaphas (Leader of the Opposition), & the Commissioner of Jerusalem Police.
title: An Innocent Man?
plot_es: Made in the style of "Australian Story" (ABC-TV), it imagines the original Easter story in a modern-day context and presents interviews with Pontius Pilate, John Caiaphas (Leader of the Opposition), & the Commissioner of Jerusalem Police.
